mapper.insert: insert into adminuser (vAdminUser, vAdminPassword, cPasswordSalt, isSa) values (#{adminUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSa,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select vAdminUser, vAdminPassword, cPasswordSalt, isSa from adminuser
